name: Sheet Pan Garlic Ginger Chicken and Broccoli
description: Sheet Pan Garlic Ginger Chicken and Broccoli - a simple and low-maintenance meal prep option, with huge flavor and no refined sugar. ♡
keywords: chicken and broccoli recipe, sheet pan chicken recipe, meal prep chicken
recipeIngredient: 4 medjool dates (you can also use 1/4 cup honey or sugar)
1 pound boneless skinless chicken breasts or thighs, cut into strips
1 head broccoli, cut into florets (about 5 cups)
sesame oil, sesame seeds, and/or green onions for topping

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees. Blend all sauce ingredients together until smooth.
recipeInstructions.name: Prep Sauce

recipeInstructions.text: Place chicken, broccoli, and red pepper on a sheet pan. Pour about 1/2 cup sauce over top of the chicken and just a few tablespoons over the veggies. Bake for 10-15 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Sheet Pan Action

recipeInstructions.text: While the broccoli and chicken are roasting, simmer another 1/2 cup or so of sauce in a small saucepan over medium low heat until it’s thickened. Drizzle it over the finished chicken and broccoli. Finish with sesame oil, sesame seeds, or scallions. Voila! Happy bowls and meal prep lunches.
recipeInstructions.name: Finish It Fancy

review.reviewBody:
Lindsey and Company: This. Blog. Is. On. Fire! We will shop for the ingredients for this recipe tomorrow. On deck for 2-nite: reheating the final two portions of your out-of-control-good Red Pepper Pasta with Roasted Cauliflower!  

Cheers,

Michael & Dora
Rome, Italy
I tried it right now and it was so delicious. Thank you for your inspiration.
